    • Field Detail

      • NDE_ATTRIBUTE_LOCATION

        public static final java.lang.String NDE_ATTRIBUTE_LOCATION
        Hint. NDE Attribute For Outputting In the HEAD/BODY. Valid values are "HEAD" and "BODY". Currently used for inline NDEType.JS.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • _separateNDEs

        void _separateNDEs(java.util.Set<net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.html.NDE> processed,
                   java.util.List<net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.html.NDE> toSeparate,
                   java.util.List<net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.html.NDE> jsList,
                   java.util.List<net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.html.NDE> cssList)
        Separate NDEs into jsList and CSSList.
        Parameters:
        processed - set of all processed NDEs to weed out dups.
        toSeparate - NDES to separate.
        jsList - the JS list to update.
        cssList - the CSS list to update.

      • getDirectorySelector

        public static @Nullable net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.ComboBox getDirectorySelector(net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.html.NDEType type)
        Get a directory selector for the specified type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type. JS and CSS are guaranteed to be supported.
        Returns:
        the component or null if not supported.

      • getUrlForNDE

        public @NonNull java.lang.String getUrlForNDE(@Nullable CmsRequest<?> request,
                                              net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.html.NDE nde)
        Get URL for an NDE.
        Parameters:
        request - the request. May be null.
        nde - the nde.
        Returns:
        the url or an error URL if the NDE is invalid.

      • outputNDEs

        public java.util.List<net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.html.NDE> outputNDEs(CmsRequest<?> request,
                                                                                       CmsResponse response,
                                                                                       java.util.Set<net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.html.NDE> processed,
                                                                                       boolean isXHTML)
                                                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Output all NDEs for an HTML document. This should be called while outputting the HEAD element.
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        response - the response.
        processed - the NDEs that have been processed. It is recommended that this is a TreeSet using NDEResourceComparator.
        isXHTML - true if the content being generated is XHTML.
        Returns:
        the JavaScript NDEs to be output inline. It is up to the caller to determine how these are output, typically they are output at the bottom of the document.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs

      • writeResource

        public void writeResource(net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.FactoryResource resource,
                          java.io.PrintWriter pw)
        Write the resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource.
        pw - the print writer.
